name: Swing It
description:
Swing it is a game about swinging a ball .... it was in the title how didn't you see it :/

Controllers :

left click and drag to SWING the ball
right click to switch the ball's color 

Tips :
the obstacles have three colors 
RED - GREEN - BLUE 
use the switch to match your color with the obstacles 
BTW , you only have 2 colors : GREEN - BLUE 

THANKS TO :
Swissou , SmailoDZ , Pexpex , Safiro and Papo for the inspiring ideas and for there support

music : 

made for : GeoJam 2021
